騰.definition: (bound form) to gallop; to prance; (bound form) to soar; to hover; to make room; to clear out; to vacate; (verb suffix indicating repeated action)

騰出.definition: to make (some time or space) available (for sb)

騰出手.definition: to get one's hands free (to do sth else)

騰挪.definition: to move; to shift; to move out of the way; to divert (money etc) to a different purpose

騰格里.definition: Tengri, the sky god in Mongolic and Turkic mythology

騰格里沙漠.definition: Tengger Desert, located in Inner Mongolia and Ningxia

騰空.definition: to soar; to rise high into the air

騰訊.definition: Tencent, Chinese tech conglomerate, founded in 1998

騰越.definition: to jump over; to vault; to soar over

騰飛.definition: lit. to fly upwards swiftly; fig. rapid advance; rapidly developing (situation)
